mapper.select: SELECT a.tdmvSeq ,a.tdmvMovieTitle ,a.tdmvTitleEng ,a.tdmvAudienceScore ,a.tdmvRank ,a.tdmvStory ,a.tdmvShowType ,a.tdmvDirector ,a.tdmvCast ,a.tdmvGenres ,a.tdmvRunningTime ,a.tdmvAge ,a.tdmvReleaseDate ,a.tdmvAudienceNumber ,a.tdmvTrailer ,a.tdmvLiked ,a.tdmvRegDate ,a.tdmvModDate ,a.tdmvDelNy ,a.tdmvUseNy ,a.tdmvPercent ,a.tdmvState FROM tradMovie a WHERE tdmvSeq = #{tdmvSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tradMovie SET tdmvDelNy = 1 WHERE tdmvSeq = #{tdmvSeq}
mapper.select: select tdmvSeq from tradMovie order by tdmvSeq desc limit 1
select * from tradMovieUpload where 1=1 and pseq = #{pseq} and defaultNy = 1
SELECT movie.* ,image.* FROM tradMovie movie JOIN tradMovieUpload image on image.pseq = movie.tdmvSeq where image.defaultNy = 1 order by movie.tdmvRank limit 4

SELECT movie.* ,image.* FROM tradMovie movie JOIN tradMovieUpload image on image.pseq = movie.tdmvSeq where 1=1 and image.defaultNy = 1
AND movie.tdmvState = 1 AND movie.tdmvState = 2
order by movie.tdmvRank

select mc.tdmcSeq ,mc.tdmcCreatDate ,mm.ifmmId ,mc.tradMovie_tdmvSeq ,mc.tdmcContent ,mc.tdmcRate from tradMovieComment mc JOIN infrMember mm on mc.infrMember_ifmmSeq = mm.ifmmSeq where 1=1 and mc.tradMovie_tdmvSeq = #{tdmvSeq} order by mc.tdmcSeq desc

SELECT a.tdmvSeq ,a.tdmvMovieTitle ,a.tdmvTitleEng ,a.tdmvAudienceScore ,a.tdmvRank ,a.tdmvStory ,a.tdmvShowType ,a.tdmvDirector ,a.tdmvCast ,a.tdmvGenres ,a.tdmvRunningTime ,a.tdmvAge ,a.tdmvReleaseDate ,a.tdmvAudienceNumber ,a.tdmvTrailer ,a.tdmvLiked ,a.tdmvRegDate ,a.tdmvModDate ,a.tdmvDelNy ,a.tdmvUseNy ,a.tdmvPercent ,a.tdmvState FROM tradMovie a WHERE 1=1 AND a.tdmvDelNy = 0 AND a.tdmvState = 1
